patentName: composições para o debridamento, granulação e reepitelização de ferimentos em seres humanos
abstract: composições para o debridamento, granulação e reepitelização de ferimentos em seres humanos a presente invenção refere-se a composições para aplicação tópica com base em produtos naturais, de modo específico, plantas secas e pulverizadas suspensas em mel de abelhas, em que os ingredientes estão combinados em proporções predeterminadas para obter três diferentes tipos de preparações para aplicações em várias fases de reparo e regeneração de tecidos lesionados. a plicação das composições encurta as fases de cicatrização no tratamento de lesões agudas e crônicas de qualquer grau de profundidade e extensão, e de qualquer etiologia. as propriedades das preparações incluem uma atividade vascular hemorreológica e sistêmica, que se prolonga por um período determinado, mesmo após o termino do tratamento tópico.
inventor: NURIA SULAYNE ANGULO CONFORME (EC); VICTOR GRACIEL ANGULO CONFORME (EC); VICTOR HUGO ANGULO BORJA (EC)

patentName: método para produzir painéis flexíveis de madeira balsade corte transversal
abstract: resumo patente de invenção: "método para produzir painéis flexíveis de madeira balsa de corte transversal". a presente invenção refere-se a um método para a produção de um painel flexível de núcleo de madeira balsa de corte tranversal (80, 100), o qual é conformável com uma superfície de contornos, no qual em um lado do núcleo da madeira balsa (95), uma tela de algodão (26) é aplicada. o método compreende as seguintes etapas: a. produzir um painel colado nas beiras (egp) a partir de uma pluralidade de vigas uniformes de madeira serrada (10) todas com a mesma direção do grão (dg) se estendendo de modo longitudinal, provendo pelo menos em uma parte lateral (62) de cada viga de madeira serrada (10) um adesivo, organizando um número predefinido de vigas de madeira serrada (10) em uma única linha e colando as partes laterais (62) das vigas de madeira serrada (10); b. cortar o egp (60) em um ângulo reto na direção do grão (degp) em um número de ripas individuais de madeira serrada (65), todas com a mesma espessura e comprimento; c. dispor um número predefinido de ripas de madeira serrada (65) lado a lado sobre uma superfície plana ou plataforma para que uma parte lateral (66) fique em contato com a superfície plana ou plataforma e compactar mecanicamente as ripas de madeira serrada (65) para que pelo menos um dos seus lados compridos (68) fique em grande contato com a ripa adjacente de madeira serrada (65); d. colar uma tela de algodão (26) em uma parte lateral compartilhada das ripas compactadas de madeira serrada (67) resultando em um painel transversalmente dobrável de núcleo de madeira balsa de corte tranversal (80).
applicant: PLANTACIONES DE BALSA PLANTABAL S A (EC)
inventor: ALLISON ANDRADE (EC); BUENO FAUSTO (EC); CHRISTIAN GATTIKER (CH); SASCHA MATTHIAS JUNGHANNS (DE)

patentName: DERIVADOS DE DEHIDROLEUCODINA Y USOS DE ESTOS
abstract: La presente invención proporciona derivados de dehidroleucodina. En particular, la presente invención proporciona derivados de amina de dehidroleucodina y métodos para utilizar la dehidroleucodina y los derivados de amina de dehidroleucodina para inhibir el crecimiento de las células de cáncer.

patentName: ['Preparation and Use of a Composition for Prevention and Mitigation of the Effects of Radiation']
abstract: Plant extracts, compositions, pharmaceutical compositions and methods of making and using the same are provided herein. The compositions comprise γ-tocotrienol (GT3) and δ-tocotrienol (DT3) in ratios wherein the DT3 is predominate. The compositions are useful for radioprotection and radiomitigation in subjects in need thereof.
applicant: BIOVENTURES LLC (US); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); US VETERANS AFFAIRS (US); BIOVENTURES LLC (US); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); US VETERANS AFFAIRS (US)

patentName: "COMPOSICIÓN ACUOSA BIODEGRADABLE A BASE DE EXTRACTOS NATURALES PARA LA LIMPIEZA, Y COMO DESINFECTANTE, REPELENTE DE INSECTOS, INSECTICIDA Y AROMATIZANTE"
abstract: La invención proporciona una composición acuosa biodegradable a base de extractos naturales (esencias naturales y aceites esenciales), amonio cuaternario, propilenglicol, Cellocize, EDTA, Tween 80, ácido bórico, aromas, colorantes y agua, para limpieza, desinfección como antiséptico y que posee una actividad bactericida de amplio espectro, es decir, bactericida a la vez sobre bacterias gram positivas y gram negativas; asímismo, como insecticida o por lo menos como repelente de insectos y como aromatizador.

patentName: ['AQUEOUS COMPOSITION BASED ON NATURAL EXTRACTS FOR CLEANING, AND AS A DISINFECTANT, INSECT REPELLENT, INSECTICIDE AND FRESHENER']
abstract: The invention provides a biodegradable aqueous composition based on natural extracts (natural essences and essential oils), quaternary ammonium, propylene glycol, Cellocize, EDTA, Tween 80, boric acid, aromas, colorants and water, for cleansing, disinfecting as an antiseptic and possessing a broad-spectrum bactericidal activity, ie bactericidal at once on gram positive and gram negative bacteria; also as an insecticide or at least as an insect repellent and as a freshener.

In one embodiment, a device for estimating frequency of the periodic signal includes a processor that receives a periodic signal and a periodic estimator module that is executable by the processor to estimate a length of a predefined number of cycles of the periodic signal with respect to a comparator signal to generate a length estimate for each of the predefined number of cycles, and store the length estimates. The periodic estimator module is further executable by the processor to sample the stored length estimates with replacement to generate resampled estimated vectors, and to calculate resample means for each of the resampled estimated length vectors, wherein each resample mean is the average of the length estimates in a respective resampled estimated length vector. The periodic estimator module is then executable by the processor to calculate a final periodic estimate of the periodic signal based on the resample means.
inventor: HERNANDEZ PERDOMO WILMAR (ES); CALDERON CORDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); CAMPOVERDE ROJAS CARLOS ISRAEL (EC); LANCHI OCHOA JOHN PAUL (EC)

patentName: Fluido de tratamiento entrecruzado y métodos de fracturación de formaciones subterráneas basados en agua de retorno, agua de producción, agua de mar, agua dulce y mezclas de las mismas
abstract: La presente invención proporciona fluidos de fracturación entrecruzados que permiten la reutilización de agua de retorno sin ningún tratamiento, minimizando el impacto ambiental de la misma y reduciendo a niveles muy bajos el uso de agua dulce para estimular nuevos pozos o re-estimular pozos estimulados en el pasado. Se proveen métodos de preparación y uso de dichos fluidos en formaciones subterráneas de fracturación penetradas por pozos, basados en agua de retorno, agua de producción, agua de mar, agua dulce y mezclas de las mismas. Los fluidos se componen básicamente de: agua de retorno, agua de producción, agua de mar, agua dulce o mezclas de las mismas presentes en una cantidad suficiente para hidratar el agente gelificante y para formar un fluido acuoso gelificado; un agente gelificante; un agente de control de hierro; un buffer alcalino; un agente de entrecruzamiento retardado, y un sistema de ruptura para romper el fluido y mejorar la limpieza de la fractura.
applicant: ORIENTAL IND ALIMENTICIA O I A CIA LTDA (EC)

patentName: ['RECOVERY OF HYDROCARBONS FROM THE VAPOR PHASE BY ADSORPTION DURING DEGASSING OF A LIQUID GAS TANK']
abstract: The method relates to a method, to a device and to the use of a device for the recovery of hydrocarbons from the vapor phase of a liquid gas mixture from at least one liquid gas tank using an adsorber, wherein the recovery takes place during degassing, wherein, in order to increase the adsorption capacity of adsorbents, use is made of a fluid in order to cool the adsorbents of the adsorber, the temperature of which is regulated at least in part by the evaporation of the liquid gas mixture from at least one other liquid gas tank.
inventor: BATHEN DIETER (DE); BIRKMANN FLORIAN (DE); PASEL CHRISTOPH (DE); SCHRAVEN GUIDO (DE)

patentName: ['A METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR OXIDIZING ORGANIC FATS WITHIN AN INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE']
abstract: It is widely appreciated that renewable sources of energy are desirable. In particular, in recent years the development of biodiesel has been encouraged in order to find a replacement for fossil fuels in internal combustion engines. Typically, such biodiesel is based on triacylglycerols of vegetable origin. Animal fat, due to its different chemical composition and production process presents additional challenges when attempted to be used as a source of fuel. Most known methods require extensive processing of naturally occurring fats in order for them to be usable in conventional engines. According to the present invention, there is provided a method of oxidizing organic fats within an internal combustion engine to generate power by applying a first electrical charge to an oxidizer (e.g. air) and applying a second electrical charge to the organic fat opposite in polarity to the first electrical charge. In this way, constituents of the organic fat to be oxidized are attracted to the oxidizer, in preference to an interior surface of the combustion chamber. Thus, carbonization of the interior surface of the combustion chamber is reduced, as material contributing to carbonization is retained within exhaust gas.

patentName: MURO ESTRUCTURAL CON UNA ESTRUCTURA EXÓGENA A SU EJE LONGITUDINAL PARA POSIBILITAR SU RELLENO INTERIOR EN OBRA
abstract: La presente invención está referida a un muro estructural con elementos reticulados, exógenos o no al eje longitudinal del muro, lo que permite el vertido de su relleno interior en obra. Esto es aplicable a un gran número de variantes, espesores y materiales. La utilización de la presente invención permite industrializar la colocación de rellenos en obra a muros que antes no podían ser rellenados debido a los elementos estructurales internos.

patentName: PROCESO PARA APROVECHAR RESIDUOS SÓLIDOS DOMICILIARIOS Y CONVERTIRLOS EN MATERIA PRIMA ALIMENTICIA
abstract: El campo general de la invención es el procesamiento de material orgánico con el fin de permitir su reutilización. De manera más particular, se relaciona con un procedimiento para procesar y aprovechar residuos sólidos domiciliarios (RSDs) para obtener materia prima alimenticia, caracterizado por tener las siguientes etapas: retiro de material inorgánico de los RSDs; troceado del material obtenido en la etapa previa; extracción de humedad por calor y compresión de material obtenido en la etapa previa; y secado final del material obtenido en la etapa previa para obtener la materia prima alimenticia.

The invention relates to an absorbent product for hydrocarbons and oils, intended for the industrial field. The product employs vegetable fibres together with polyterpene resin and/or resin from asphaltenes/maltenes to create an adsorbent and absorbent product having an immediate sequestering action and providing a micro- and macro-encapsulation effect, used for hydrocarbon or oil spills.

patentName: ['METHOD FOR PRODUCTION AND USE OF SYRUP DERIVED FROM THE FRUIT PULP OF THE CACAO POD']
abstract: A process for producing a cacao syrup from liquefied pulp created during fermentation of cacao seeds in the chocolate-making process. This process comprises selecting adequately ripe and disease free cacao pods; opening said pods and removing the cacao seeds and pulp; placing the seeds and pulp in a heap or covered fermentation box; fermentation of said seeds and pulp resulting in liquefied pulp, or drippings; collecting the drippings for a period of one hour after the start of fermentation; filtering the drippings; and reducing the drippings through boiling to produce cacao syrup. Cacao syrup can be used to produce various products, including soft drinks and drinking vinegar- Further fermentation and distillation results in an alcoholic spirit. Pure cacao syrup can be used in food preparation as a flavoring or texturizing agent.
applicant: TOTH JERRY (US); LOPATA JACOB (US); SCHWEIZER CARL (EC); PACHARD SERVIO (EC)
inventor: TOTH JERRY (US); LOPATA JACOB (US); SCHWEIZER CARL (EC); PACHARD SERVIO (EC)

patentName: DISPOSITIVO DE REDUCCIÓN DE EMISIONES DE GASES CONTAMINANTES POR GESTIÓN CATALÍTICA EN EL PROCESO DE COMBUSTIÓN
abstract: Dispositivo de reducción de emisiones de gases contaminantes por gestión catalítica en el proceso de combustión caracterizado porque comprende una forma cilíndrica hueca con un orificio para entrada de combustible en un lateral de dicha forma cilíndrica y otro para salida de combustible en el otro lateral de dicha forma cilíndrica, un separador perforado cilíndrico en su interior y con una lámina compuesta al menos por un elemento magnético, situada entre dicho separador perforado y la pared interior de la forma cilíndrica hueca, de modo que, cuando el combustible fluye por el interior de dicho dispositivo parte de los componentes del hidrocarburo se magnetizan.
applicant: ENCOLNVEST INT S L (ES); MORILLAS GOMEZ IGNACIO (EC)

patentName: APARATO DE BOMBEO HIDRÁULICO DE FONDO UNIDIRECCIONAL PARA INCREMENTO DE CAUDAL DE REINYECCIÓN / INYECCIÓN DE AGUA DE FORMACIÓN EN POZOS DE PETRÓLEO
abstract: La presente se refiere a un aparato de bombeo hidráulico de fondo unidireccional para utilizarse en pozos petroleros, que se instala a la profundidad deseada por el usuario, para incrementar el caudal del agua de formación a reinyectarse / inyectarse desde un tanque de almacenamiento en la superficie a las arenas del yacimiento y a las zonas requeridas. La bomba de superficie inyecta a través de la tubería de producción un caudal de agua de formación, el cual al atravesar la boquilla del aparato de bombeo hidráulico de la presente, genera el efecto Venturi por el cual se ocasiona el diferencial de presión que succiona el fluido de formación almacenado por gravedad en el espacio anular existente entre la tubería de producción y la tubería de revestimiento. De esta manera, el caudal así succionado se suma al caudal procedente de la tubería principal, aumentando considerablemente el caudal total de reinyección sin necesidad de incrementar bombas a nivel de superficie.

patentName: DISPOSITIVO DE ACTUACIÓN DE TAPAS DE INODORO
abstract: la presente invencion estavrealacionada con la tapas que se disponen para cubrir los inododros proponiendo un disspositivo para actuar la vasculacion de dichas tapas entre las posiciones de abatimiento y de elevacion o viceversa sin que el usuario tenga que topar las tapas con las manos.

patentName: ['BIOPROCESS FOR PRODUCING BIOETHANOL FROM TAGUA NUT']
abstract: The present invention relates to a bioprocess for obtaining bioethanol from the endosperm of tagua nut, a second-generation bioprocess, which consists in crushing tagua nuts and grinding same to obtain a fine powder having a particle size of less than 100 µm, and subsequently impregnating with 1% w/v H2SO4 , performing acid hydrolysis in a reactor, filtering, neutralising, inoculating microorganisms, and fermenting, to finally obtain products and sub-products with industrial use.
applicant: PONTIFICIA UNIV CATOLICA DEL ECUADOR (EC); CARVAJAL BARRIGA ENRIQUE JAVIER (EC); BASTIDAS MAYORGA BERNARDO DAVID (EC); PORTERO BARAHONA PATRICIA (EC)
inventor: CARVAJAL BARRIGA ENRIQUE JAVIER (EC); BASTIDAS MAYORGA BERNARDO DAVID (EC)

patentName: ['FLUSHING AND CLEANING SYSTEM AND FLUSHING METHOD FOR A TOILET']
abstract: The invention relates to a flushing and cleaning system (100) for a toilet device, comprising a toilet bowl (10) and at least one toilet seat (14, 16) as well as a toilet lid (12). The flushing and cleaning system (100) comprises a cleaning space (24) which is separate from the space in which the toilet bowl (10) is located. The at least one toilet seat (14) or, when two toilet seats (14, 16) are provided, one of the two toilet seats (14, 16) is arranged in said space for cleaning purposes.

The invention relates to a screw comprising an associated screwdriver or bit, wherein the screw head is designed in such a way that for any screwdrivers or bits, specifically comprising a slotted head, one-way slotted head, cross head (Phillips), torx, internal square (Robertson), internal hexagon (Inbus), torq-set, Pozidrive or tightener, sufficient contact surfaces are provided in order to transmit the torque from the screwdriver or bit to the screw head.

patentName: ['MOVEABLE HOOD FOR THE SELECTIVE APPLICATION OF AT LEAST ONE AGROCHEMICAL']
abstract: The invention relates to a moveable hood for the selective application of at least one agrochemical, which defines an ecological hood comprising a top and two side parts, with a flexible curtain at both ends. A pair of deformable parallelograms is located on the top, from which the hood is suspended at a distance from the ground, and at least one sprinkler nozzle is disposed inside the hood and at least one second sprinkler nozzle is disposed outside the hood, coming from different sprinklers that do not interact with one another, with the spray remaining inside the hood, contained inside same and isolated from the action of the wind.
applicant: ACOSTA ARIEL NESTOR (AR); GARCIA ROJAS CHRISTIAN JAVIER (EC)

patentName: ['MARITIME TRANSPORT SYSTEM FOR OIL AND DERIVATIVES THEREOF']
abstract: The invention relates to a maritime transport system for oil and the derivatives there of, which comprises a tractor unit with means for driving at least one floating, rotary spheroid container. The at least one container has two semi-spherical domes, an upper one and a lower one, that are closed at the base end and open at the other, the base of each containing a flat surface. Both domes are assembled with the open ends facing one another and are joined at the circular perimeter thereof by a fitting belt with securing means and a gasket, both being solidly joined together. Inside the container are disposed an upper structure and a lower structure that are solidly connected to connecting beams, defining a self-supporting cube-shaped cage with projecting rotating means and multiple individual housing cells for at least one tank of fluid to be transported.
applicant: OJEDA CARLOS ALBERTO (AR); GARCIA ROJAS CHRISTIAN JAVIER (EC)

abstract: Embodiments of the invention provide a fat free food product and method of making. In some embodiments, the food product is bouillon. The fat free food product is anhydrous, and contains a protein and a zero-fat binder. The binder includes a starch, an edible polyhydric alcohol, and a gum. The fat free food product has a protein content of 1.15% to 4.5% w/w. The food product contains no added fat.
inventor: MEDINA JORGE (EC); RIQUERO MARIUXI (EC); GARCIA JORGE JULIAN (EC)

abstract: Embodiments of the invention provide a solid food product, made with a fat free binder and a method of making. The binder includes a starch, an edible polyhydric alcohol, and a gum. In some embodiments, the food product is bouillon.
inventor: JORGE MEDINA (EC); MARIUXI RIQUERO; JORGE JULIAN GARCÍA

abstract: Las realizaciones del invento proporcionan un producto alimenticio sólido, hecho con un aglutinante libre de grasa y proporcionan el método de preparación. El aglutinante incluye un almidón, un alcohol polihídrico y, alternativamente una goma. El objeto de esta solicitud de invención está centrada en la obtención de un producto alimenticio donde se haya sustituido total o parcialmente la grasa por un sistema aglomerante basado en alcoholes polihidroxílicos y almidones y con un nivel de humedad entre 1% a 2.5%. El producto alimenticio en todas sus realizaciones originará un sólido seco (Actividad de agua entre 0,5 y 0,6) que podrá cambiar de estado de forma reversible, pudiendo ser comprimido a estado sólido de cubo y regresar con solo la presión de los dedos a su forma inicial de gránulos o solidos secos. Este cambio de estado en ambas direcciones puede realizarse cuantas veces sea requerido. La invención en su forma de solido seco permite soportar un alto nivel de presión, pero con la capacidad de separar la masa en porciones exactas solo con la presión de los dedos. De esta forma, el usuario podrá separar parte del producto con una pequeña presión de los dedos sin necesidad de usar un elemento cortante, cuando desee usar solo una parte del cubo, cuando no se necesite un cubo completo.Embodiments of the invention provide a solid food product, made with a fat free binder and a method of making. The binder includes a starch, an edible polyhydric alcohol, and a gum. In some embodiments, the food product is bouillon.
inventor: RIQUERO MARIUXI (EC); GARCIA JORGE JULIAN (EC); MEDINA JORGE (EC)

patentName: produto alimentar sólido e método para produzir um produto sólido feito com ligante livre de gordura
abstract: as modalidades da invenção fornecem um produto alimentar sólido, feito a partir de um ligante livre gordura e um método de fabricação do mesmo. o ligante inclui um amido, um álcool polihídrico comestível e uma goma. em algumas modalidades, o produto alimentar é caldo.

abstract: Las realizaciones del invento proporcionan un producto alimenticio sólido, hecho con un aglutinante libre de grasa y proporcionan un método de preparación. El aglutinante libre de grasa incluye almidón, alcoholes polihídricos y goma. El objeto de esta solicitud de invención está centrado en la obtención de un producto alimenticio donde se ha sustituido la grasa por un sistema aglomerante basado en alcoholes polihidricos, almidones y goma. El producto alimenticio en todas sus realizaciones originará un sólido seco. En algunas de las realizaciones el producto alimenticio es caldo.

abstract: Las realizaciones del invento proporcionan un producto alimenticio sólido, hecho con un aglomerante libre de grasa y proporcionan el método de preparación. El aglomerante incluye un almidón, un alcohol polihídrico y una goma. En algunas realizaciones, el producto alimenticio es un caldo.

patentName: ['HEURISTIC OPTIMIZATION METHOD FOR DETERMINING STOCHASTICS FOR LIVE BETS']
abstract: The invention relates to a method for the optimized determination of stochastics for a winnings probability prediction (5) with a predefined minimum percentage (1) and provides registered users (6) with betting tips (5a) for placing live bets with selected betting providers/bookmakers (8), taking into account various game moment criteria (10), live statistics (2), a predefined algorithm (11), and the betting odds for "next goal" (4a) and/or "over goals" (4b).

abstract: El presente diseño industrial se refiere al diseño ornamental de un Contenedor Epóxico, cuyas características especiales se describen a continuación según los dibujos que forman parte integral de esta presentación en donde: La Figura 1 es una vista en perspectiva frontal del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 2 es una vista posterior en perspectiva del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 3 es una vista lateral izquierda del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 4 es una vista lateral derecha del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 5 es una vista frontal del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 6 es una vista posterior del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 7 es una vista superior del contenedor epóxico; La Figura 8 es una vista inferior del contenedor epóxico.

patentName: MECANISMO PROPULSOR DE ÁLABES DE BOMBA CENTRÍFUGA PARA TRANSPORTE DE LÍQUIDOS Y FAUNA VIVA
abstract: La presente invención consiste en un mecanismo propulsor de álabes de bomba centrífuga para transporte de líquidos y fauna viva que tienen como novedad y actividad inventiva una configuración técnica funcional en el propulsor (impulsor). De manera general el problema a resolver se centra en obtener una bomba centrífuga que contenga un mecanismo propulsor con una configuración técnica funcional que permita un buen paso de fluidos y especies vivas sin dañarlas (principalmente), de manera eficiente, en gran cantidad, y que además sea de fácil fabricación, ya que actualmente no se encuentra en el estado del arte, tales ventajas competitivas. Lo anterior se obtiene específicamente en la innovación de los álabes y de la parte distal interna de los mismos, haciendo de esta última una pieza cilíndrica o una extensión curva altamente pronunciada para alcanzar dicho fin, permitiendo una entrada amortiguada y suave de las especias vivas que serán transportadas.
applicant: BUSTAMANTE SANDOVAL FRANCISCO JAVIER (EC); ROBLES CONTRERAS ANGEL HERIBERTO (EC)
inventor: BUSTAMANTE SANDOVAL FRANCISCO JAVIER (MX); ROBLES CONTRERAS ANGEL HERIBERTO (EC)

abstract: A musical instrument activity monitoring system having a tracking and monitoring assembly including a microcontroller with non-volatile memory, an accelerometer, at least one sensor, and an antenna each in communication with the microcontroller, a power source, and a coupler. In-use parameters of musical instrument activity is tracked and monitored by the tracking and monitoring assembly. The microcontroller with non-volatile memory stores data. The data relates to values and timestamps retrieved from use of the at least one musical instrument and environmental conditions at least one musical instrument is in to analyze performance of the at least one musical instrument.
applicant: PAHL SHANNON (US); GOEDVOLK EARL (EC); PAHL DAWN (EC)
inventor: PAHL SHANNON (US); GOEDVOLK EARL (EC); PAHL DAWN (EC)

abstract: Antitheft and security nuts and bolts are formed by a linking body having a screw thread. The head of the linking body has at least one first disk-shaped coaxial body followed by a body having a smaller diameter, with an axis that is parallel to the axial axis and is eccentrically located at a distance from the axis. A casing defined by a revolution body is arranged coaxially to the axis of the linking body and is axially rotatable in relation to the linking body. The linking body extends through a passage in the base of the casing and protrudes therefrom over a distance which defines a surface capable of pressing and retaining together the parts linked by the linking body.
applicant: KLARENBERG ALEJANDRO JOSE (AR); TAVERNITI VICENTE JOSE (AR); GARRIDO TORRES LILIA DEL CARMEN (EC)

patentName: ['CASING FOR THE CIRCULATION OF FLUIDS AT THE BOTTOM OF A WELL, WITH A DOWNWARD-FACING OPENING, FOR OIL WELLS']
abstract: The invention relates to casings for the circulation of fluids, used at the bottom of oil wells, applicable in conventional systems for bottom completion in the oil industry. Specifically, it consists in the modification of the design of the casing in the form of the opening thereof, which is carried out by moving the sliding sleeve downwards, the aim of which is to solve the problem of the accidental closing of the casing as a jet pump enters same.
applicant: SERTECPET S A (EC); SERTECPET S A (EC)
inventor: LOPEZ ROBAYO BYRON RAUL (EC); LOPEZ ROBAYO BYRON RAUL (EC)

patentName: Camisa de circulación de fluidos en fondo, con apertura hacia abajo, para pozos de petróleo
abstract: Resumen La presente invención se relaciona con camisas de circulación de fluidos, utilizadas en el fondo de pozos de petróleo, aplicable en los sistemas convencionales de completación de fondo en la industria petrolera. Específicamente, consiste en la modificación del diseño de la camisa en su forma de apertura, que se hace por el desplazamiento del manguito deslizante hacia abajo y cuyo objetivo es solucionar el problema que representa el cierre accidental de la camisa al momento del ingreso de una bomba jet en su interior.

patentName: ['APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR OPTICAL ULTRASOUND SIMULATION']
abstract: A training method for imaging includes obtaining a dataset volume for an organ of a patient in an ultrasound imaging mode, and providing a template associated with the dataset volume to an optical ultrasound system location. The method also includes providing a virtual transducer with a label thereon to the optical ultrasound system location. A webcam is attached to the template. The webcam is positioned to view the label on the virtual transducer. The method includes determining the planar position of the virtual transducer from optical information obtained from the webcam image of the label. Once the planar position is determined, the planar position of the virtual transducer is related to the corresponding plane in the dataset. The plane related to the dataset is then displayed at the displaying the plane from the dataset at the optical ultrasound system location.

patentName: ['SINGLE-SERVE SMOKING SYSTEM, DEVICES, KIT, AND METHODS']
abstract: A method of making a prepackaged, combustible unit of a plant based material for use in an inhalation system, metered dose inhaler, or dry powder inhaler. The method includes creating and shaping a combustible material packaging by processing leaves or plant fibers into a fibrous sheet, steaming the fibrous sheet, and using a female mold and a corresponding male mold to shape the combustible material packaging. The method further discloses filling pockets disposed within the combustible material packaging with the combustible material and sealing the combustible material packaging around the combustible material to create a prepackaged, combustible unit. Additional embodiments include various inhalation devices, inhalation systems, kits having instruction as to using the inhalation device, and methods of making the prepackaged combustible unit, and methods for using the inhalation devices.
applicant: HEMPHILL MARK ALAN (US); TORRES MARCELO (EC); HEMPHILL MARK ALAN (US); TORRES MARCELO (EC)
inventor: HEMPHILL MARK ALAN (US); TORRES MARCELO (EC); HEMPHILL MARK ALAN (US); TORRES MARCELO (EC)

patentName: ['BREATHING APPARATUS COMPRISING A DIFFERENTIAL PRESSURE SENSOR']
abstract: The invention relates to a method and apparatus for breathing. The present breathing apparatus comprises a differential pressure measuring section which provides for a volumetric flow differential pressure characteristic curve having improved resolvability for small volumetric flows. The improved characteristic curve is achieved using a claimed arrangement of a flow channel and at least two pressure measurement connecting pieces or at least two measurement openings in the region of said flow channel.
applicant: WEINMANN EMERGENCY MEDICAL TECH GMBH & CO KG (EC)
inventor: DIEHL MARCUS (DE); HEIN STEFAN (DE); PULLA MATTHIAS (DE); HERRMANN FRANK (DE)

abstract: The present invention separates a space in a container into smaller spaces to store frozen foods. For instance, a cylindrical container could be used to store a mixture of ingredients to prepare a smoothie. By separating the cylindrical space into smaller spaces using a cross sectional design, these prevents the mixture of ingredients to stick together forming a large and bulky mass. Instead the cross sectional separation only allows the ingredients to stick forming smaller chunks of ingredients. At the moment of use, when trying to liquify the mixture using a blender, this separation is very effective. Separating the mixture of ingredients into smaller pieces can reduce the blend time significantly.
applicant: ESCOBAR NUNEZ LUIS GILBERTO (US); ESCOBAR NUNEZ ALEJANDRO GONZALO (EC)
inventor: ESCOBAR NUNEZ LUIS GILBERTO (US); ESCOBAR NUNEZ ALEJANDRO GONZALO (EC)

patentName: FUNDA PLÁSTICA CON PROPIEDADES INSECTICIDAS A BASE DE UNA COMPOSICIÓN INSECTICIDA QUE CONTIENE EL COMPUESTO LAMBDA CIHALOTRINA, PARA BANANO Y OTROS FRUTOS
abstract: El presente modelo se refiere a una funda plástica derivada de un concentrado de ingrediente activo de insecticida en resina de plástico; que se puede realizar con una composición insecticida que contiene un compuesto de LAMBDA CIHALOTRINA concentrado hasta 63.2 y 70; como gránulo soluble en equivalentes en gramos de ingrediente activo (I.A./kg o L) de: 37.5 y como microencapsulado en equivalentes en gramos de ingrediente activo (I.A./kg o L) de: 50 y 120).
applicant: IND DE PLASTICOS PALACIOS MARQUEZ PALMAPLAST C LTDA (EC); JUAN HORACIO CABEZAS PEREZ (EC)

patentName: ['PLASTIC COVER WITH INSECTICIDAL PROPERTIES, BASED ON AN INSECTICIDAL COMPOSITION THAT CONTAINS THE LAMBDA-CYHALOTHRIN COMPOUND, FOR BANANA AND OTHER FRUITS']
abstract: The present utility model relates to a plastic cover having insecticidal properties. More particularly, the plastic cover is embedded with an insecticidal compound comprising Lambda-Cyhalothrin. A method of producing the plastic cover is also disclosed herein.
applicant: IND DE PLASTICOS PALACIOS MARQUEZ PALMAPLAST C LTDA (EC); IND DE PLASTICOS PALACIOS MARQUEZ PALMAPLAST C LTDA (EC)

patentName: ['SYSTEM OF DEVICES AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING A STABILISED MICROEMULSION FROM DIESEL WITH WATER']
abstract: The present invention relates to a system and method for producing a stabilised magneto microemulsion made from diesel with water, the method comprising a chemical treatment with surfactants or emulsifiers. The method is carried out with the interaction of four main devices which are: a polarising field (100) for polarising liquid fluids, a differential-flow magnetic mixer (200), a closed-domain magnetic field (300) and a continuous cavitation mixing chamber (400) for stabilising the emulsion by means of magnetic turbulence fields.

patentName: ['Clamping tool for smoking articles (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)']
abstract: Useful for the fastening of smoking articles, in particular, for the attachment of a cigarette lighter and cigarette box, characterized by being constituted by a main body in the form of a U (1), like a clip or clip, of limbs straight lines (2), configuring a space or hole (3) where to house objects and a second body or supplementary clamp (5), of identical configuration and of smaller size, where one of its extremities is formed by the very base of the main element (4) and the other is independent (6), leaving the resulting gap (7) located perpendicular to the hollow of the main body. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

patentName: ['DEVICE FOR THERMALLY AND CATALYTICALLY TREATING MATERIAL CONTAINING CARBON']
abstract: The invention relates to a device (17) for treating material (18) containing carbon, comprising a multi-chamber system (26), which has a combustion chamber (1), which can be filled with a mixture (21) and which is connected to an energy generation device (11) and to a reaction chamber (3), wherein: - an upstream irradiation apparatus (12) is provided downstream of the reaction chamber (3); - at least one plasma-generating apparatus (37) is provided downstream of said irradiation device (12), which plasma-generating apparatus is connected downstream to a reactor (5), which can be filled with a mixture (21); - a second irradiation apparatus (13) is provided downstream of the reactor (5); - a filter apparatus (43) is provided downstream of said irradiation apparatus (13), which filter apparatus is connected downstream to a gasifying apparatus (46), which is connected downstream to the combustion chamber (1); - a catalytic reaction zone (16) is provided downstream of the filter apparatus (43); - a device (47) for splitting the gas stream exiting the reaction zone (16) is provided downstream of the reaction zone (16).
applicant: PHILIPP FRANZ JOSEF (EC); PHILIPP MONIKA (DE); PHILIPP STEPHANIE (DE); PHILIPP DENNIS CHRISTOPHER (DE); PHILIPP FRANZ JOSEF (DE); PHILIPP MONIKA (DE); PHILIPP STEPHANIE (DE); PHILIPP DENNIS CHRISTOPHER (DE)

patentName: Registro para mecanismo de tierras y pararrayos
abstract: Esta invención se refiere a un registro para sistemas de tierras y pararrayos, constituido de una estructura de forma rectangular, a base de polipropileno desde su plataforma hasta su cubierta, a través de los cuales, ingresan el mismo número de cables que se irán contados al "busbar" que aloja el registro, el cual perfectamente se encuentra asilado de cualquier agente externo que pueda afectar su correcto funcionamiento, y mismo "busbar', que se encuentra conformado de una barra de acero, que tiene dispuesto un opresor con cuatro tuercas para cada uno de los cables que serían unidos a esta, lo cual impedirá que se presente algún desajuste que denote impedancia1 , intersticiales2 o cualquier otro tipo de anomalía en el drenaje a tierra por varilla que se interconecta al mismo "busbar" por su parte interior.

patentName: ['INDUSTRIAL PLANT HAVING AN ELECTROFLOCCULATING SYSTEM, ELECTROFLOCCULATING SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING STEVIOL GLYCOSIDES FOR CREATING A NONCALORIC FOOD ADDITIVE']
abstract: The invention relates to an industrial plant having an electroflocculating system, an electroflocculating system and method for producing steviol glycosides for creating a noncaloric food additive, comprising a blade mill for breaking up stevia; a source for capturing and pumping process water via a sand and activated carbon filter and an inverse osmosis system; a first and second tank for digesting milled leaves and water; a first and second centrifugal decantation vessel; an electroflocculating system for liquid from the first and second decantation vessel; a third centrifugal decantation vessel for receiving the product from the electroflocculator; a system having means for ultrafiltration-nanofiltration via semi-permeable membranes packed in a spiral, such as a means for isolating the steviol glycosides extract from other unwanted substances; an evaporation tower for liquid from the filtered steviol glycosides; and a system for drying said concentrated liquid, producing a solid product from steviol glycosides at 95% purity and stevia residue for the agricultural industry.
applicant: VILLALBA LEANDRO (AR); ASIS JUAN CARLOS (AR); GARRIDO TORRES LILIA DEL CARMEN (EC)

abstract: Diseño nuevo, original y ornamental de una CONFIGURACIÓN DE ASIENTO COMUNAL PARA AERONAVE como se muestra en las figuras adjuntas.

The invention relates to a method for producing a non-oxide ceramic powder comprising a nitride, a carbide, a boride or at least one MAX phase with the general composition Mn+1AXn, where M = at least one element from the group of transition elements (Sc, Ti, V, Cr, Zr, Nb, Mo, Hf and Ta), A = at least one A group element from the group (Si, AI, Ga, Ge, As, Cd, In, Sn, TI and Pb), X = carbon (C) and/or nitrogen (N) and/or boron (B), and n = 1, 2 or 3. According to the invention, corresponding quantities of elementary starting materials or other precursors are mixed with at least one metal halide salt (NZ), compressed (pellet), and heated for synthesis with a metal halide salt (NZ). The compressed pellet is first enveloped with another metal halide salt, compressed again, arranged in a salt bath and heated therewith until the melting temperature of the salt is exceeded. Optionally, melted silicate can be added, which prevents the salt from evaporating at high temperatures. Advantageously, the method can be carried out in the presence of air.
inventor: DASH APURV (DE); GONZALEZ JESUS (DE); VASSEN ROBERT (DE); GUILLON OLIVIER (DE)

patentName: ['MOLECULAR MODIFIER FOR COMBUSTIBLE AND NON-COMBUSTIBLE FLUIDS, LIQUIDS AND GASES']
abstract: The present invention relates to a magnetic and electromagnetic device that molecularly modifies non-combustible fluids, liquids and gases by means of magnetic turbulence. The device combines magnetic and electromagnetic fields for producing magnetic turbulence that modifies the atomic behaviour of diamagnetic materials to be processed by changing the covalence thereof, improving the assimilation of fluid in humans by increasing the surfactant quality of the fluids in physical states.

The invention relates to a toilet seat accessory. The invention is intended to improve hygiene conditions while using a toilet of the type that comprises a seat with an opening providing access to the toilet bowl. The invention comprises: a body (1) including at least one central opening to be aligned with the opening in the toilet seat, and having a padded plastic upper surface for supporting the user; legs (2) connected to the body (1) and designed to be secured to the toilet seat; and a folding mechanism (3) provided on the body (1) and designed to allow the body (1) to be folded symmetrically.

patentName: ['SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR PREVENTING ACCIDENTS CAUSED BY THE PRESENCE OF OBJECTS ON TRANSPORT ROUTES RESULTING FROM NATURAL PHENOMENA']
abstract: The invention can be used to generate an early warning signal in real time when a transport route is affected by an anomaly (4) blocking the movement of vehicles. For this purpose, first sensors (1) are used to obtain data from the transport route environment and to transmit said data wirelessly to a control centre (6), where a decision is taken to use verification means (2, 3), such as unmanned aircraft or mobile devices (2), equipped with: second sensors for detecting anomalies (4); and georeferencing means for generating georeferencing information (7) relating to the anomalies (4) and for transmitting said information to the control centre (6), where an alarm is generated in real time which is communicated to users (7) of the transport route and to emergency vehicles (9).
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC)

abstract: The present invention unites in a single accessory the functions of a bottle holder and a basic tool kit commonly used for repairing or maintaining bicycles. The bottle-holder comprises, as part of its structure, a support (2) that can be coupled to the bicycle frame (12), and the tools (1), and is completed by a top cover (3) that defines, together with the support (2) and the tools (1), a receptacle for accommodating bottles. The bottle-holder can be easily taken down to allow the tools (1) to be normally used.

patentName: ['DETACHABLE DEVICE THAT CAN BE FITTED TO SUPPORTS USED TO TAKE SELFIES']
abstract: The present invention relates to a detachable device that can be fitted to supports used to take selfies, which can be used to position the mobile phone and to capture images from the front. More specifically, the aim of the invention is to fit an additional system to a system as originally manufactured, i.e. a rain and sun protector. A mini-solar-panel is fitted to this visor-type protector, which captures solar energy and conveys same to a storage battery. The energy is then used to power the mobile phone and an LED-type flashlight located on the phone holder, illuminating the user's face more directly and for longer, providing lighting for a greater length of time. In this way, the phone's power is not used for night-time photographs or films, and it can also be used as an emergency flashlight.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC)

abstract: Thermoelectric generator module. A thermoelectric generator module comprises a top layer comprising a plurality of Fresnel lenses (4), an insulating material protection (5) arranged under the first layer, a thermoelectric generator arranged under the insulating material protection (5) and provided with a structure having a heat-distribution layer (2) arranged under the insulating material protection (5), a central layer with a plurality of Peltier devices (1) arranged under the heat-distribution layer (2), and a cold-distribution layer (3) arranged under the central layer. The thermoelectric generator module also comprises a bottom layer (6) with a plurality of Venturi pipes (7) arranged under the cold-distribution layer (3), a battery, an energy quality and storage control block (BCA) and a user interface block (BIU) to interconnect multiple modules.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC); JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC)

abstract: Módulo de generación termoeléctrica. Comprende una capa superior que comprende una pluralidad de lentes de Fresnel (4); un protector de material aislante (5) dispuesto bajo la primera capa; un generador termoeléctrico, dispuesto bajo el protector de material aislante (5), con una estructura con una capa distribuidora de calor (2) dispuesta bajo el protector de material aislante (5), una capa intermedia con una pluralidad de dispositivos Peltier (1) dispuesta bajo la capa distribuidora de calor (2), y una capa distribuidora de frío (3) dispuesta bajo la capa intermedia. Dispone también de una capa inferior (6) que dispone de una pluralidad de tubos Venturi (7), dispuesta bajo la capa distribuidora de frío (3); una batería; un bloque de control de calidad de energía y almacenamiento (BCA) y un bloque de interface de usuario (BIU) para conectar varios módulos entre sí.
inventor: JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC)

abstract: The invention relates to a semi-autonomous lighting device formed by an essentially vertical support (1) that can be connected to the ground, a plurality of cultivation modules (2) connected to the support (1), an energy storage and management module (3) connected to the cultivation modules (2), an energy-saving lamp (4) equipped with a photoelectric actuation sensor (5), and an auxiliary external power supply (6) connected to the storage and management module (3) and supplying additional power to the device if necessary. The electricity supplied by each of the cultivation modules (2) is sent to the storage and management module (3) where the energy quality controller monitors and controls the availability and quality of the energy supplied by all of the cultivation modules (2).
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC)

abstract: A portable cleaning device comprises a hollow gripping handle (1) and a hollow body (7) linked to one end of the handle (1) and having a throughgoing slot (8). The handle comprises a cleaning liquid receptacle (2), a sprayer and a liquid recharging opening (6). The body (7) houses a telescopic rod (9) linked to the handle (1), a joint (10) linked to the free end of the telescopic rod (9), a locking element (11) to immobilise the articulation (10) and the telescopic rod (9), two foldable tubular arms (12) that extend from the articulation (10), a brush (13) and a sponge (14) being linked to each of the arms, and rotating screws (15) linked to each of the arms (12) to rotate the brush (13) and the sponge (14) on the arm (12).
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); ZUÑIGA SUÁREZ ALONSO RODRIGO (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); ZUÑIGA SUÁREZ ALONSO RODRIGO (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC)

abstract: The invention relates to a portable folding accessory for accessing bathtubs of the type that comprise a bottom (8) and a rim (7) disposed at a given height relative to the bottom (8). The invention comprises a folding structure including an upper step (3) intended to be placed on the rim (7) of the bathtub and first and second side steps extending in opposite directions from the upper step (3), such that the first side steps are disposed outside the bathtub and the second side steps are disposed inside the bathtub. The invention also comprises clamps (1) to be connected to the rim (7), wheels (5) connected to the folding structure, and a folding mechanism allowing the accessory to be stored and transported more easily, as well as a removable handrail.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: FEBRES EGUIGUREN JUAN DIEGO (EC); REYES BUENO JORGE FELIPE (EC); SOLANO CUEVA NATALI ELIZABETH (EC); GUAYA CARAGUAY DIANA ELIZABETH (EC); FEBRES EGUIGUREN JUAN DIEGO (EC); REYES BUENO JORGE FELIPE (EC); SOLANO CUEVA NATALI ELIZABETH (EC); GUAYA CARAGUAY DIANA ELIZABETH (EC)

patentName: ACCESORIO PORTÁTIL Y PLEGABLE DE ACCESO A BAÑERAS
abstract: Accesorio portátil y plegable de acceso a bañeras del tipo de las que comprenden una base (8) y un borde (7) dispuesto a una determinada altura respecto a la base (8). Comprende una estructura plegable con un escalón superior (3) destinado a quedar dispuesto sobre el borde (7) de la bañera y unos primeros escalones laterales y unos segundos escalones laterales que se extienden en direcciones opuestas desde el escalón superior (3) tal que los primeros escalones laterales quedan dispuestos fuera de la bañera y los segundos escalones laterales quedan dispuestos dentro de la bañera. También comprende unas mordazas (1) configuradas para quedar unidas al borde (7), unas ruedas (5) unidas a la estructura plegable y un mecanismo de plegado para poder almacenarlo y transportarlo más fácilmente. Dispone de una barandilla (4) desmontable, con unos extremos destinados a quedar alojados en unos orificios (6) dispuestos en los escalones laterales.
inventor: FEBRES EGUIGUREN JUAN DIEGO (EC); GUAYA CARAGUAY DIANA ELIZABETH (EC); REYES BUENO JORGE FELIPE (EC); SOLANO CUEVA NATALI ELIZABETH (EC)

abstract: The invention relates to a socket having a body (1), intended to receive the screw base of a bulb, said socket comprising side openings (2) and an adjustment element projecting partially through the side openings (2), which adjustment element is made from a conductive material and is diametrically expandable, such that different sized bulb bases can be fitted therein, without affecting the electrical connection between the electrodes of the bulb and the socket.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC)

abstract: El zócalo incorpora un cuerpo (1), destinado a recibir el casquillo de rosca de una lámpara, que consta de unas aberturas laterales (2) y un elemento de ajuste que sobresale parcialmente a través de las aberturas laterales (2), que es de material conductor expansible diametralmente que garantiza la sujeción de distintos tamaños de casquillo de lámparas, sin afectar la conexión eléctrica de los electrodos de la lámpara y del zócalo.
inventor: JARAMILLO PACHECO JORGE LUIS (EC); BERMEO LEÓN CARLOS BYRON (EC); BARBA GUAMÁN LUIS RODRIGO (EC); GUAMÁN BASTIDAS FRANCO OLIVIO (EC)

abstract: The invention relates to a retractable urinal accessory for toilets that comprise a bowl with an opening, a lid, and a seat with an opening aligned with the opening in the bowl. The invention comprises an extendable bag (2) designed to cover the lid and the seat of the toilet (1) in the extended position; a base (3) connected to the bag (2) and designed to cover the opening in the seat, said base including a first hole through which urine can flow into the bowl of the toilet (1); closure means (4) disposed on the bag (2) such that the bag (2) can be closed in the retracted position; and a second hole (5) provided in the bag (2) in an area covering the lid, intended to receive a cleaning hose. The invention improves the functionality of unisex bathrooms.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: SOLANO CUEVA NATALI ELIZABETH (EC); GUAYA CARAGUAY DIANA ELIZABETH (EC); REYES BUENO JORGE FELIPE (EC); FEBRES EGUIGUREN JUAN DIEGO (EC); SOLANO CUEVA NATALI ELIZABETH (EC); GUAYA CARAGUAY DIANA ELIZABETH (EC); REYES BUENO JORGE FELIPE (EC); FEBRES EGUIGUREN JUAN DIEGO (EC)

abstract: A boneless food cutting device comprises a horizontal base (1) for placing on a surface, a holder (3) located in the base (1) for holding a plate (4) carrying the food (5) to be cut, and a fixed vertical column (6) that extends from the base (1). An articulated mechanism (7) is linked to the column (6) and a transverse plate (8) is in turn linked to the articulated mechanism (7), a plurality of cutting elements (9) for cutting the food, (5) facing the holder (3) and extending from the bottom of the transverse plate. The cutting device includes movable elements linked to the holder (3) for rotating the plate (4) with the food (5) and moving it longitudinally, and a control (10) for actuating the movable elements and the articulated mechanism (7).
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: GARCIA RAMIREZ YASMANY DAMIAN (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC); BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC); GARCIA RAMIREZ YASMANY DAMIAN (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC); BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC)

abstract: The invention relates to a modular parametric educational device comprising a plurality of first modules (1) and second modules (2) which can be physically coupled to one another. In turn, each module (1, 2) comprises a laminar body (6) with rounded peripheral edges, and tongue-and-groove connectors (3) for physically coupling each module to the corresponding module. Each of the first modules (1) includes first electrical connectors (4), lighting elements (7), and a first electrical circuit for connecting the lighting elements (7) to the first connectors (4). Each of the second modules (2) includes a photovoltaic solar panel (8) for capturing solar radiation and generating electrical energy, second electrical connectors (5), which can be placed against the first connectors (4) in order to transmit the electrical energy to the lighting elements (7), and a second electrical circuit for connecting the solar panel (8) to the second electrical connectors (5).
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC); GARCIA RAMIREZ YASMANY DAMIAN (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC); BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC); GARCIA RAMIREZ YASMANY DAMIAN (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC)

abstract: Embodiments of the invention provide a solid food product, made with a fat free binder and a method of making. The binder includes a starch, an edible polyhydric alcohol, and a gum. In some embodiments, the food product is bouillon.
inventor: MEDINA JORGE (EC); RIQUERO MARIUXI (EC); GARCIA JORGE JULIAN (EC)

patentName: ['DEVICE FOR CHARACTERISING THE SOIL PROPERTIES OF AGRICULTURAL LAND']
abstract: The invention relates to a device for characterising the soil properties of agricultural land, comprising: measurement elements (1) that can be buried in the soil; and an external processing and control unit (12) radio-linked to the measurement elements (1), comprising at least one database with crop growth models and climate variables. Each of the measurement elements (1) comprises a casing (2) housing: sensors (5) for determining the physico-chemical variables of the soil; a data-processing and -storage unit (6) for collecting the variables determined; a wireless transmission unit (7) linked to the processing and storage unit (6); transmission antennas (8) linked to the wireless transmission unit (7), for transmitting the determined variables; and a power source (11). The measurement elements (1) include inertial sensors (9) and a GPS unit.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); MALLA PACHECO PABLO ESTUARDO (EC); IRENE ROBALINO PEDRO DANIEL (EC); VALAREZO VALDEZ BENITO EDUARDO (EC); ORTÍZ VIÑÁN ANA PAULINA (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); MALLA PACHECO PABLO ESTUARDO (EC); IRENE ROBALINO PEDRO DANIEL (EC); VALAREZO VALDEZ BENITO EDUARDO (EC); ORTÍZ VIÑÁN ANA PAULINA (EC)

abstract: The invention relates to a protective covering for newborn babies, comprising a bag (1) designed to receive the baby's lower limbs and torso. The bag (1) comprises an access opening (2), an outer sheet (3), an inner sheet (4) positioned facing the outer sheet (3) and connected to same, and an air chamber (5) between the inner (4) and outer (3) sheets. The invention also comprises a valve (6) extending between the interior of the air chamber (5) and the exterior, allowing air to enter and leave the air chamber (5). In addition, two upper compartments (8) extend outwards from the bag (1) in order to receive each of the upper limbs, and two lower compartments (7) are provided inside the bag (1) in order to receive each of the baby's legs.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: GARCIA RAMIREZ YASMANY DAMIAN (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC); BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC); GARCIA RAMIREZ YASMANY DAMIAN (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC); BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC)

abstract: Envoltorio protector de recién nacidos que comprende una bolsa (1) configurada para albergar en su interior las extremidades inferiores y el tronco de un bebé. La bolsa (1) comprende a su vez una abertura (2) de entrada, una lámina externa (3), una lámina interna (4), confrontada y unida a la lámina externa (3) por sus respectivos bordes, y una cámara de aire (5) delimitada entre las láminas interna (4) y externa (3). Una válvula (6) que se prolonga entre el interior de la cámara de aire (5) y exterior, para permitir la entrada y salida de aire hacia y desde la cámara de aire (5). Dos alojamientos superiores (8) se prolongan hacia el exterior de la bolsa (1) para albergar en su interior las respectivas extremidades superiores, y dos alojamientos inferiores (7) están definidos en el interior de la bolsa (1) para albergar por separado las piernas del recién nacido.
inventor: DUQUE YAGUACHE EDWIN PATRICIO (EC); ROJAS AZUERO HENRRY VICENTE (EC); GARCÍA RAMÍREZ YASMANY DAMIÁN (EC); BURNEO VALDIVIESO XAVIER EDUARDO (EC); RAMÍREZ CORONEL RAMIRO LEONARDO (EC)

patentName: ['SYSTEM FOR INTERACTING WITH BOARD GAMES FOR THE BLIND']
abstract: The invention relates to an interaction between a board game, with a playing area (10) and game pieces (11), and an interaction system, including interface pieces (12) which represent actions of the player, player identifiers (15a, 15b), piece identifiers for identifying at least the interface pieces (12) and optionally also the game pieces (11), speakers (18), a control unit, and an artificial vision system which captures and stores images of the playing area (10), the piece identifiers, the play positions (13) and each player identifier (15a, 15b), and coordinates the actions of the player without the need for wireless communication.
applicant: UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC); UNIV TECNICA PARTICULAR DE LOJA (EC)
inventor: CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC); CALDERÓN CÓRDOVA CARLOS ALBERTO (EC); QUIÑONES CUENCA MANUEL FERNANDO (EC); ZUÑIGA TORRES BERENICE CECIBEL (EC); PINEDA PUGLLA EDGAR IVÁN (EC)

abstract: Embodiments of the invention provide a solid food product, made with a fat free binder and a method of making. The binder includes a starch, an edible polyhydric alcohol, and a gum. In some embodiments, the food product is bouillon.
inventor: MEDINA JORGE (EC); RIQUERO MARIUXI (EC); GARCIA JORGE JULIAN (EC)

patentName: Funda plástica con propiedades insecticidas a base de una composición insecticida que contiene el compuesto lambda cihalotrina , para banano y otros frutos
abstract: El presente modelo se refiere a una funda plástica derivada de un concentrado de ingrediente activo de insecticida en resina de plástico; que se puede realizar con una composición insecticida que contiene un compuesto de LAMBDA CIHALOTRINA concentrado hasta 63.2 y 70; como gránulo soluble en equivalentes en gramos de ingrediente activo (I.A./kg o L) de: 37.5 y como microencapsulado en equivalentes en gramos de ingrediente activo (I.A./kg o L) de: 50 y 120). La funda plástica resultante se aplica directamente en la zona que se encuentra afectada en la planta, en los racimos recién emergidos o con una bráctea abierta para ejercer la barrera química contra las plagas insectiles del banano y el plátano.
applicant: CABEZAS PEREZ JUAN HORACIO (EC); IND DE PLASTICOS PALACIOS MARQUEZ PALMAPLAST C LTDA (EC)

patentName: ['DRIED ATTRACTIVE LURE AND KILL STATIONS FOR THE CONTROL OF AEDES AEGYPTI']
abstract: An effective dried attractive toxic bait station that acts as a lure and kill device for Ae. aegypti and other mosquitoes. The bait station is a simulated refuge at least part of which is coated with a dried mixture of poison and sugar forming a dried toxic sugar-containing bait. The simulated refuge attracts Ae. aegypti and other mosquitoes to bait station and encourages them to land on the coated portion. Once a mosquito has landed, it detects the sugar in the dried mixture of sugar and poison and ingests some of it. Once ingested, the dried mixture of poison and sugar will eventually kill the mosquito.
applicant: LARSEN DAVID (US); STEWART ANNA (US); NEIRA MARCO (EC); UNIV SYRACUSE (US); LARSEN DAVID (US); STEWART ANNA (US); NEIRA MARCO (EC); UNIV SYRACUSE (US)
inventor: LARSEN DAVID (US); STEWART ANNA (US); NEIRA MARCO (EC); LARSEN DAVID (US); STEWART ANNA (US); NEIRA MARCO (EC)
